about_the_game:
Z Ops: Deadzone is an intense and immersive first-person shooter that thrusts you into a world devastated by a zombie apocalypse. In this FPS, you play as a member of the Z Ops, a global organization tasked with ensuring humanity's survival and restoring a semblance of order amidst the chaos.

Synopsis:

The apocalypse wasn't caused by a mere virus, but by a formidable parasite called Bane-Z, capable of taking control of human brains and transforming its hosts into ruthless zombies. This parasite continues to spread, turning more and more people into ferocious creatures. As civilization collapses, the Z Ops fight desperately to protect what remains of humanity.

Key Features:

  • Visceral and strategic combat: Face hordes of zombies infected by the Bane-Z parasite, each requiring unique strategies. Encounter more powerful predatory zombies and terrifying queens capable of spreading the infection.

  • High-risk raid missions: Embark on expeditions to retrieve essential resources while facing both human and zombie enemies.

  • Survival management: Manage your fatigue and energy before each raid. Balancing exploration, recovery, and resource management is crucial.

  • Customization and varied arsenal: Utilize a wide range of weapons, each customizable, to adapt to situations and maximize your chances of survival.

  • Dynamic factions and interactions: Collaborate or clash with various factions, each with their own motives, influencing your progression and alliances.

Are you ready to enter the dead zone?
Humanity is on the brink, and you are its last hope.

Developed using Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States and elsewhere.

content_descriptors.notes: Z Ops: Deadzone includes scenes of intense violence and gore. Players will witness zombies devouring humans, blood splatter, and other graphic depictions of severe injuries, such as throat wounds. The game also features survival themes in a post-apocalyptic setting with moments of extreme tension. There is no sexual content or references to sexual assault, drug or alcohol abuse, or self-harm in this game.

name: Z Ops: DeadZone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500 @2,7 Ghz / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 2 Go / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel i5 4570 @ 3,2 Ghz / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 4 Go / AMD Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX

short_description: Z Ops: Deadzone is an intense FPS where you play as a member of Z Ops, a global organization fighting for humanity's survival after a zombie apocalypse. Battle hordes of zombies infected by the Bane-Z parasite and take part in dangerous raids.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
